q: Sergio Marchionne used the term "shyster loans" three times Friday in an address at an auto dealer's convention in San Francisco, but he issued a statement the next day expressing his regrets. I used a term in reference to the interest rate being charged on our government loans that has raised concern. I regret the remark which I consider inappropriate, Sergio Marchionne said in his statement. The Detroit News said Sunday that Steve Rattner, who was the Obama administration's "auto czar" during the bailout, said the loans were made at or below market

is just the front end of a back-to-back that concludes with a trip to see the Phoenix Suns Thursday night before All-Star Weekend. "Great team effort," Dirk Nowitzki said after Saturday night's win. Good thing is we've got almost like a small All-Star break already. Three days off in the middle of the season doesn't happen very often. So, we're gon na recuperate. Have a big back-to-back and hopefully get them both, that would be nice. And then, hopefully, go on the break feeling good about ourselves and come back and make a heck of a run in the second half of the season.
